titleStmt.title: Peters enlargement vpon the prayers of the Church. By Master Harris
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for Iohn Bartlett, and are to be sould at the golden Cup, in the Gold-smiths Rowe in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Differs from the first edition in that it has an added preface.
Identified as STC 12340b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
